titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2606) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2606 with 1 hour of general debate. Rule waives all points of order against the conference report and against its consideration.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-345, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 118.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 307.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/28/1999--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2606 (foreign operations, export financing, and related programs appropriations).
